column1: Anything less will be a stain on our electoral system that will do irreparable harm to our republic. I stand with @realdonaldtrump during this process. (3/3)

This election is not over and our president and the American people should not quit. We all need to play through the "echo of the whistle" to ensure that this election is free and fair where every LEGAL vote is counted. That is the only acceptable outcome. (2/2)

Thread: Growing up in western Pa my football coaches taught me to "play not just through the whistle but through the echo of the whistle!” They said there’s no quitting. To stay on it stay on it stay on it. Don't ever quit! (1/3)

Thank you western Pennsylvania! I am honored that you have chosen me to be your voice in our nation’s capital. Together we will keep fighting for freedom our values a brighter economic future for our families and a stronger more prosperous America.

Today is the day western Pennsylvania! With your support we can win the most important election of our lifetime. Together we will choose faith over fear. We will choose freedom over socialism.  We will make America great again again! https://t.co/ZlVGY369iT
America is the greatest and most noble nation in the history of mankind and our children should learn the reasons why! https://t.co/dwnoXF61YJ

They say that 90% of life is showing up because when you show up people know you care.  @realDonaldTrump made history tonight in Butler PA as the first sitting president to visit OUR town.  This president shows up for us. NOW it’s time we show up for him - on Election Day! https://t.co/M6o7LgKqPu
I am working every day to make prescription drugs more affordable. No one should suffer because their medications are too expensive. https://t.co/bWbkWsSMSp

Seems that Joe Biden has some explaining to do. He’s taking responsibility for putting together "the most extensive and inclusive voter fraud organization in the history of American politics.” What? https://t.co/We7hT8Ojcv

Joe Biden should apologize for insulting millions of Pennsylvanians who support @POTUS @realDonaldTrump. I’m proud to be one of those “chumps” (deplorables?) who will choose to Make America Great Again over the Biden/Harris socialist agenda. https://t.co/MbNs0ucDUu

One of our top priorities should be protecting the right to life for the unborn. I am proud to be their champion and thankful to receive the endorsement of the Pennsylvania Family Council for my pro-life advocacy in our nation’s capital. https://t.co/3uSnV57Qk8
Great night in Erie with @POTUS @realDonaldTrump. He loves Pennsylvania and has fought harder for us than any president in memory. Let’s #KeepAmericaGreat  and Keep Erie Red! https://t.co/i00M6RqBe6

.@POTUS @realDonaldTrump returns to Erie on October 20! I like to say that 90% of life is showing up because when you show up people know you care. This president has consistently shown up and fought for hard-working western Pennsylvanians and has never taken us for granted.

Folks this is what we are up against in our fight to re-elect @realDonaldTrump.  This is yet another example of Big Tech censoring information it deems insufficiently friendly to their preferred presidential candidate Joe Biden.  https://t.co/m8MNTcUqMu

Just arrived in Johnstown for the @realDonaldTrump rally and enthusiasm is off the charts! Lines are long and we can expect a big crowd tonight. PA wants to Keep America Great! https://t.co/KlinuNIgjd

Joe Biden said this week that Wabtec's Erie plant was "thinking of shutting down." That was news to Wabtec which called it "an integral part of the business and our community." Workers aren't political pawns. Biden should apologize to Local UE 506 and retract this false claim.

I just spoke with @POTUS @realDonaldTrump. He loves Pennsylvania and knows that to Make America Great we need a thriving Keystone State. He doesn’t take us for granted. Let’s give him four more years by keeping PA red!

Kamala Harris says she and Joe won’t raise taxes on anyone making below $400000 per year but they want to repeal the Tax Cuts and Jobs Act which let middle and low income workers keep far more of their hard-earned money. They can’t do both!

Fracking has helped make western Pennsylvania part of the Great American Comeback! The Biden/Harris Green New Deal will eliminate thousands of energy jobs in our region. Say no to Joe! https://t.co/OyabUoeeQU
Sometimes we just need someone to fight for us. I will continue to do that for western Pennsylvanians here at home and in our nation's capital. https://t.co/ni7evModl9

Let’s keep PA working by standing w/ @realDonaldTrump and saying no to Joe and his Green New Deal. Though Biden tried to distance himself from the GND last night he can’t hide that Kamala Harris helped write it his party is for it and his website calls it a “crucial framework.”
Thank you @POTUS @realDonaldTrump for keeping your promises and fighting for Pennsylvanians! https://t.co/6r94GLO4Sy
Well it looks like the one job that Joe Biden created in his 47 years in politics was really lucrative.  https://t.co/8Cfv2HsvDV

🚨A federal judge declared Gov. Wolf’s shutdown orders unconstitutional!🚨  I joined this lawsuit because emergency declarations do not supersede our right to free association due process and equal protection under the law. Big day in PA!  https://t.co/AZCbQtGwty
Happy Birthday Mr. President! @realDonaldTrump #LawrenceCounty https://t.co/xvg5hRxAgl
Biden finally said something that @realdonaldtrump and I can agree with... ‘I can beat Joe Biden’.  https://t.co/Vy2cLWKOOG
#PA16 #Economy #JobGrowth  https://t.co/UuaiIfTcfE
